description: 10 weekly online quizzes (1% each) covering threshold content. Requires scoring 10/10 on one attempt with unlimited retries. Includes multiple-choice questions and instant feedback.
Two in-term tests (15% each) in weeks 5 and 9. Assess threshold topics via 20 multiple-choice questions in 45 minutes. Threshold mark is 15/20, with capped resit opportunities.
Compulsory lab classes assessing core skills (hurdle requirement) and non-core skills (10% each). Requires attendance at 6/8 labs, safe practices, and completion of pre-lab work/reports.
2hr 10min exam during official university period. Focuses on mastery content with MCQ, short numerical, and short answer questions. Requires understanding of threshold concepts as foundation.
